charges.charge_description: Possess w/intent to distribute approx 198 lbs, gr wt, of marihuana [21 USC 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(C) and 18 USC 2] Offense Date: 7/2/87 Penalty: 0-20 yrs and/or $1 Million, $50 CVF, 3-5 yrs SRT (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct 9-5 yrs to serve conc to Ct 2, $50 CVF, TSR 3 yrs, $1500 fine to be pd. Ct 2-5 yrs to serve, $50 CVF, TSR 3 yrs. (2)

Money laundering [18 USC 1956(a)(1)(A)(i) &; 18 USC 2] Offense Date: 11/2/87-11/21/87 Penalty: 20 yrs and/or $500,000 (or twice the value of the property involved in the transaction, whichever is greater), $50 CVF, 5 yrs TSR as to each count (9)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct 9-5 yrs to serve conc to Ct 2, $50 CVF, TSR 3 yrs, $1500 fine to be pd. Ct 2-5 yrs to serve, $50 CVF, TSR 3 yrs. (9)
